metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36131 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
AOM v2.0.1 was discovered to contain a stack buffer overflow via thecomponent stats/rate_hist.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36131` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

aom-tools - 1.0.0.errata1-3+deb11u1build0.20.04.1
libaom0 - 1.0.0.errata1-3+deb11u1build0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: aom package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.0.errata1-3+deb11u1build0.20.04.1').
